Package com.teambaccrat.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teambaccrat.controller.Controller
  • public class Controller
extends Object
    Receives and validates user input, and run game using methods in Game, and updates View.

      Receives user bet input, and set the valid bet using setBet method in Game
      void startGame()
      Calls game methods in Game to starts game, deals cards, and gets results Each dealt card will be presented to the user with 1.5 seconds of time interval.

      • getBet

        public static String getBet()

      • setAmount

        public void setAmount()
        Receives user bet input using, and run setAmount method in Game only if the bet input is valid. Confirms bet amounts to user by presenting print out.

      • isValidBalance

        public Boolean isValidBalance()
        Checks if user balance is more than minimum bet, 20.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Calls game methods in Game to starts game, deals cards, and gets results Each dealt card will be presented to the user with 1.5 seconds of time interval. Presents game results to user.

        All methods below will present printouts to user by updating values in printout formats in View
